attributes.action: have the hague human rights and child protection aspects of the convention revisited, to take into account the childs wishes, as in UK Law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the UK the wishes of the child are taken into account in custodial matters. Under the Hague convention discussing international child custody issues this is not given anywhere near the same weight. If you agree this should be the case please sign this.
